casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 19, 2008

[Cite as 03/19/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-1215.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1358. Zajc v. Hycomp, Inc.

Cuyahoga App. No. 88421, 172 Ohio App.3d 117, 2007-Ohio-2637. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellee’s *1433motion to stay briefing,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
